did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Jose M. Caffaro Rossi Letter 1950 September 5
did.abstract: One letter from Jose M. Caffaro Rossi, 1950 September 5, to Nina Lun.

University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jose M. Caffaro Rossi, letter, 1950, Accession #11195, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This letter was transferred from the Rare Book Division to the Manuscripts Division on June 30, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This is a letter, September 5, 1950, from Jose M. Caffaro Rossi, Buenos Aires, to Nina Lun, written in Spanish. This letter was originally laid in El Payador: Cincuenta y Dos Dibujos Originales de Albert Guiraldes. Una Lamina en Colores y Veintiun Ejemplos Musicales(Buenos Aires: Ediciones Centurion, 1944) by Leopoldo Lugones [F2809.L9 1944].
